nodes.name: subtask_01_Place_the_Bowl_back_on_the_CounterTop
preconds: Bowl is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the bowl
effects: Robot is not holding the bowl

nodes.name: subtask_02_Place_the_Bread_back_on_the_CounterTop
preconds: Bread is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the bread
effects: Bread is placed on the countertop
Robot is not holding the bread

nodes.name: subtask_03_Place_the_Fork_back_in_the_Drawer
preconds: Fork is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the fork
Drawer is close to the robot
effects: Fork is placed in the drawer
Drawer is close to the robot

nodes.name: subtask_04_Place_the_Spoon_back_in_the_Drawer
preconds: Spoon is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the spoon
Robot is close to the drawer
effects: Spoon is placed in the drawer
Robot is close to the drawer

nodes.name: subtask_05_Place_the_Mug_back_on_the_CoffeeMachine
preconds: Mug is on the dining table
Coffee machine is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the mug
effects: Mug is placed on the coffee machine
Robot is not holding the mug

nodes.name: subtask_06_Place_the_Pan_back_on_the_StoveBurner
preconds: Pan is on the dining table
Stove burner is on the floor
Robot is not holding the pan
effects: Pan is placed on the stove burner
Robot is not holding the pan

nodes.name: subtask_07_Place_the_Tomato_back_in_the_Fridge
preconds: Tomato is on the dining table.
Robot is not holding the tomato.
effects: Tomato is placed in the fridge.
Robot is not holding the tomato.

edges.reason: Same drawer object - cannot be manipulated in parallel
